alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 12:37PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Grand Forks and southern Nelson Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1236 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McVille, or 40 miles southeast of Devils Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kloten around 1240 PM CDT. Logan Center around 100 PM CDT. Kempton and Larimore around 115 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
